noAppsMessage: No applications available for your role.
title: Create Next App
faq.title: FAQ
faq.certificat.q: I need my enrollment certificate, where can I find it?
faq.lostItem.q: I lost an item — where can I find it?
faq.timetable.q: I don't see my timetable — what should I do?
faq.timetable.a: Inform the secretary either directly or by email (iut.ifs.informatique@unicaen.fr)
faq.inscriptionPedagogique.q: I have registered administratively — how do I complete my course registration?
faq.inscriptionPedagogique.a: Course registration is done at the start of the year. You must provide at the office a civil liability insurance certificate covering the academic year.
faq.leocarteReceived.q: I haven't received my Léocarte — what should I do?
faq.leocarteNotWorking.q: My Léocarte doesn't work — what should I do?
faq.leocarteNotWorking.a: Log in to https://sgc.unicaen.fr and verify your Léocarte is activated. If it's activated but doesn't work, contact support: assistance-leocarte.etudiant@unicaen.fr
faq.resign.q: I want to resign from the program — what should I do?
faq.resign.a:
1- Inform your program director
2- Write a resignation letter and send it to your program director
